page.title: 13OUR VET
page.content: We have a vet in Little Clacton who works at Kinfaun Kennels. There is a large practice which treats animals from a wide area. Altogether there are five veterinary surgeons who take it in turns to look after the animals. Between 200-300 a week are treated & if they are very ill they can stay in hospital until they get well. The vets also help birds if they are sick. Most of the animals are people's pets but they also help a small number of farm animals. Like a doctor, the vet sometimes goes to see a sick animal at the owner's home if they do not have transport or if the creature is too ill to move, or if he's been run over by a car. The boarding kennels behind the hospital can hold 100 dogs & 20 cats usually when people have to go on holiday.
